set_ship_text.name: CmndS|CmndShipNum|
set_ship_text.desc: This is a Karlien Command Ship
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Very dangerous if taken head on.

set_ship_text.name: CmndS|CmndShipNum|
set_ship_text.desc: This is a Arvonian Command Ship
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Very dangerous if taken head on.

set_ship_text.name: CmndS|CmndShipNum|
set_ship_text.desc: This is a Torgoth Command Ship
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Very dangerous if taken head on.

set_ship_text.name: CmndS|CmndShipNum|
set_ship_text.desc: This is a Skaraan Command Ship
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Very dangerous if taken head on.

event.name: CreateGrid 0,0
event.incoming_comms_text: Welcom to the training sector.^You are at 0,0^^How to use grid sectors:^X,Z (left/right, up/down)^Left is - Right is +^Up is + Down is -^^Places to go:^(Up 1) 0,1 = helm^(Down 1) 0,-1 = wepons^(Right 1) 1,0 = coms^(Left 1) -1,0 = science^(Left 1, Down 1) -1,-1 = engineer^(Right 1, Down 1) 1,-1 = FGS^(Right 1 Up 1) 1,1 = anomalies^(Left 1, Up 1) -1,1 = wild life^

event.name: CreateGrid 0,1
event.incoming_comms_text: Please dock with TH-01 for futher information.^

event.name: Give mission breefing
event.incoming_comms_text: In this sector their are plenty of obstacles to navigate through. Try diving, climping and navigating through the astroid feild. Afterwords avoid the main feild and dock with TH-02.

event.name: Give mission breefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Very Good! Now try with an upgrade. To either side of TH-02 are speed boosts. This is an upgrade that helm can activate to increase the speed of the ship. Once the anomaly has been collected and been activated go back to TH-01 to conclude this Training exercise. HINT: You may have to climb or dive to retrieve these items!

event.name: Give mission breefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Great job. Mission complete. The sector has been unlocked. Feel free to exit this sector when ever you please. The training course will reset AFTER you have left the sector.

event.name: CreateGrid 0,-1
event.incoming_comms_text: This sector is designed to teach tactical skils that are helpful in battle and also alow the wepons officer to get some practice. Please dock with TW-01 for futher information.^

event.name: Give mission breefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Lesson one. Your sensors have been limited and enemys are about. Probs are a great advanced warning system. Have wepons load a probe and fire it in the middle of A3.

event.name: find the enemy first scan
event.incoming_comms_text: Very Good. You found the enemy. Now double scan Target1 to find out more information about this target.

event.name: find the enemy second scan
event.incoming_comms_text: Good. Now you know a few things. A) The lowest shield frequency of the enemy shields and B) What the enemy will chase you over. Now that you have this information go and destroy his enemy.

event.name: killing first enemy
event.incoming_comms_text: Now for beacons. Beacons can be used to round up or disperse wildlife. Whales are near the station. load a beacon with attract Whale and launch it near WP1 to bring the Whales to that location. You may have to use more than one to round them up to that location. Beacons have a 3 minuet life span. You can recollect your beacons however after the 3 minutes they will be lost.

event.name: replel training
event.incoming_comms_text: Good job! Now lets work on repel. Piranhas are danger close to the whales. Try to gather all the piranhas into a group away from the whales first repel them away from the whales and attract them and nuke them!

event.name: Tag training
event.incoming_comms_text: Now that the piranhas are gone lets work on tags. Tags can be used on wilde life HOWEVER they work on enemys as well. Their is an enemy in A3 that has cloke. If you are able to tag this enemy his cloke is rendered useless seeing that you now are able to track him. First go dock with the station and then try it out.

event.name: arfer Tag training
event.incoming_comms_text: Now that the enemy is tagged he is reading the correct readings. Try an omega 3, that is an EMP followed by a nuke. Take him down!

event.name: arfer Tag training
event.incoming_comms_text: Good job! lastly were going to work with mines. Go dock with the station to pick up some mines and we will get started.
